alert.note: Alert for Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 12:51PM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in South Dakota... James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Minnesota... James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. Redwood River at Russell affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Forestburg. * WHEN...From late Friday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, many of the county and township roads along the river are under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday morning and continue rising to a crest of 13.1 feet Sunday. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun James River Forestburg 12.0 10.2 Thu 12 pm 11.1 12.6 13.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning.
